name: Target: Hive'Ashi Sandstalkers
tooltip:
Target: Hive'Ashi SandstalkersLevel 60

Slay 30 Hive'Ashi Sandstalkers and report back to Commander Mar'alith at Cenarion Hold in Silithus.  You must also bring Combat Task Briefing II in order to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Hive'Ashi Sandstalker x 30
